title: (x) Bjork (\_\_\_\_\_\_surrounded) typeface - custom, suggestions {Yves, Viviane, Dan P}
content:
Does somebody know what's the name of this typeface & where can I get it?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Imagen 4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100228215009/http:/typophile.com/files/Imagen%204_0.jpg) | 201.52 KB |
author: TristanMX

comments.content: Custom typeface. This one comes up so often it is even mentioned in the FAQ. :^)
you may want to look at [Easyscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20100228215009/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Script+Fonts/Easyscript/)
Fig Script is somewhat similar to this. Available from the Process Type Foundry.
